roleset.name: impelled action
roleset.note: OBLIGATE-V NOTES: The only difference between 'oblige' and 'obligate' is that the lattercan only occur in the passive. The former also prefers the passive,though. (from obligate.01-v)

example.name: always passive
example.text: Thus, [an institution]-1 obligated *trace*-1 to make fixed-rate interest payments on debt swaps the payments with another making floating-rate payments.
example.arg: to make fixed-rate interest payments on debt
